title: CLEAR_AREA_OF_PROJECTILES
content:
0x0A1CB9094635D1A60x18DB5434// ClearAreaOfProjectiles
void CLEAR_AREA_OF_PROJECTILES(float x, float y, float z, float radius, BOOL createNetEvent);Parameters:x: The x coordinate of where to clear projectiles.y: The y coordinate of where to clear projectiles.z: The z coordinate of where to clear projectiles.radius: The area radius to clear projectiles.createNetEvent: specifies whether a CClearAreaEvent event of should be created for online use.Clears an area of projectiles at the given coordinates and radius.Examples:Lua-- Clear the area, do also create an event
ClearAreaOfProjectiles(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 10000.0, true)
codeBlocks:
// ClearAreaOfProjectiles
void CLEAR_AREA_OF_PROJECTILES(float x, float y, float z, float radius, BOOL createNetEvent);

-- Clear the area, do also create an event
ClearAreaOfProjectiles(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 10000.0, true)
